author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Infantry Battalion (Territorial Army) Madras, Redfields, Coimbatore will conduct recruitment for soldiers for enlisting in the Territorial Army.

Candidates hailing from Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Maharashtra, Karnataka and the Union Territories of Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Goa, Daman & Diu, Lakshadweep and Puducherry can appear for the same on March 1 to 5, 2016 at PRS Ground, Coimbatore from 6 a.m. onwards.

According to an official press release, Physical test will be conducted only on March 1. On subsequent days, medical test and personal interview will be conducted for candidates who pass in the physical test. The candidates employed in civil organisation or self employed, ex NCC cadets (good firers), outstanding sportsmen, chef, mason, artist/painters, LMV/HMV license holders, musicians, wood art worker and dependents of servicemen/ex-servicemen will be given preference.

Personnel employed in civil organisation will have to produce a No Objection Certificate (NOC) from their employer.

Personnel seeking enrolment should be present at PRS Ground, Coimbatore at 6 a.m. on March 1 with PT shorts, shoes and original civil education certificates along with six passport size photographs.
title: Territorial Army recruitment on March 1
